name: Hand-pulled Soy Sauce Ramen
description: Our classic hand-pulled noodles in a rich, savory soy sauce broth, topped with tender chashu pork, seasoned soft-boiled egg, and fresh green onions.

name: Special Hand-pulled Soy Sauce Ramen
description: An elevated version of our classic ramen, featuring extra slices of premium chashu, a larger seasoned soft-boiled egg, and an assortment of fresh vegetables.

name: Soupless Mala Tantanmen
description: A spicy and numbing (mala) sensation with our soupless tantanmen. Thick noodles tossed in a rich sesame-chili sauce, topped with spicy ground pork, and bok choy.

name: Taiwanese Mazesoba
description: A hearty and flavorful soupless ramen inspired by Taiwanese street food. Featuring thick noodles, spicy minced meat, a raw egg yolk, and various aromatic toppings.

name: Hearty Soupless Ramen
description: A robust and satisfying soupless ramen with a rich, savory sauce, topped with braised pork belly, pickled ginger, and a sprinkle of crispy garlic.

name: Char Siu
description: Extra slices of our tender, slow-braised chashu pork, perfectly seasoned.

name: Shredded Green Onion
description: Freshly shredded green onions to add a crisp, aromatic bite to your dish.

name: Seasoned Soft-boiled Egg
description: A perfectly seasoned soft-boiled egg with a creamy yolk, ideal for adding richness.

name: Menma (Bamboo Shoots)
description: Crunchy fermented bamboo shoots, a classic ramen topping with a distinct savory flavor.

name: Spinach
description: Blanched spinach, a healthy and refreshing addition to any ramen.

name: Addictive Cucumber
description: Crisp cucumber slices marinated in a spicy and tangy dressing, truly addictive!

name: Zha Cai (Preserved Vegetable)
description: Spicy and savory preserved mustard stem, a popular Chinese appetizer with a unique crunch.

name: Hand-pulled Soy Sauce Ramen
description: Our classic hand-pulled noodles in a rich, savory soy sauce broth, served as part of a set meal.

name: Special Soy Sauce Ramen
description: An elevated version of our classic ramen, featuring extra toppings and served as a lunch set.

name: Soupless Tantanmen
description: A spicy and numbing (mala) sensation with our soupless tantanmen, offered as a lunch set.

name: Taiwanese Mazesoba
description: A hearty and flavorful soupless ramen inspired by Taiwanese street food, available for lunch.

name: Hearty Soupless Ramen
description: A robust and satisfying soupless ramen with a rich, savory sauce, offered as a lunch set.

name: Water Dumplings 3pcs
description: Three delicate pork and vegetable dumplings, boiled and served with a savory dipping sauce.

name: Fried Chicken 3pcs
description: Three pieces of crispy, juicy Japanese-style fried chicken (karaage).

name: Today's Mini Rice Bowl
description: A small, delicious rice bowl with a rotating daily topping. Please ask staff for today's special!

name: Fried Chicken Lunch
description: A generous portion of our delicious fried chicken, served with a complimentary large serving of rice.

name: Almond Tofu
description: A light and refreshing traditional Chinese dessert with a smooth, jelly-like texture and a delicate almond flavor.

name: Special Ice Cream
description: Our unique house-made ice cream with a delightful surprise flavor. Ask your server for today's special!
